lol its been up forever and he hasnt touched it so it looks like ill never get a champions shop

Lol? Never rely on a noob that posts a thread before its even finished, use Google you’ll probably have more luck on there.
[/quote]I haven’t had time. Going on forums isn’t what I do for 24/7. Also, since you like it how I didn’t finish, I’m removing the tutorial.

Is that fair enough?

Sure that’s perfectly fine with me I could easily write up a better learning tut with my eyes closed. ;)[/quote]Ok
